conditions: History of right ACL reconstruction (6 months ago, recovering well), Mild asthma (exercise-induced)
medications: Albuterol inhaler as needed before exercise for asthma, Naproxen 500mg as needed for knee pain (rarely used now), Multivitamin daily
goals: Needs medical clearance to return to competitive soccer league. Wants to confirm knee is fully healed and ready for high-impact sports. Would like guidance on injury prevention.
concerns: Knee feels good most of the time but occasionally has minor aching after long runs. Worried about re-injury. Wants to make sure he's cleared to play before season starts in 3 weeks.
personality: Athletic, impatient, and goal-oriented. Gets straight to the point. May downplay symptoms to get clearance faster. Focused on performance and competition. Appreciates efficiency and clear timelines.
